description: This file is the main entry point of a React web application. It imports React and ReactDOM libraries, applies global CSS styles, and renders the root React component `<App />` into the DOM element with id 'root'. It sets up the rendering environment with React's StrictMode for development checks.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering a React component tree.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component into the DOM element.
